actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to exempt certain entries of titanium disks from antidumping duties retroactively applied by the United States Customs Service.

summary.text: Directs the U.S. Customs Service to: (1) liquidate or reliquidate certain entries of titanium disks as exempt from antidumping duties (case number A- 462-103); and (2) refund such duties if the importer of such entries files a request with the Customs Service within 90 days of their liquidation or reliquidation.

titles.title: A bill to exempt certain entries of titanium disks from antidumping duties retroactively applied by the United States Customs Service.
